Rule.name: TRNG-IdentityLookup
Rule.Description: This rule accepts an identity name and retrieves the corresponding identity object, returning the user's email address.

Argument.name: context
Argument.Description: A sailpoint.api.SailPointContext object that can be used to query the database.

Argument.name: log
Argument.Description: The log object associated with the SailPointContext.

Argument.name: email
Argument.Description: The string value of the user's email address
